Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:漱

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+6F31

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 潄

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:漱

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+6F31

Main pronunciation 主要发音: shù

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning gargle.

English senses 英语理解: gargle, rinse; wash, scour

Usage example 用法举例: 洗漱 xǐ shù (wash one's face and rinse one's mouth)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3200

Shuowen 说文解字: 盪口也從水敕聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 潄 older 漱 from three-dot-water 氵 shuǐ and (rem- 敕 chì) from phonetic person-cough 欶 shuò C539 漱<潄> simp 漱.

shù

潄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shù］
［《廣韻》蘇奏切，去候，生。］
［《廣韻》所祐切，去宥，生。］
亦作“潄1”。“嗽3”的被通假字。
(1)含水洗荡口腔。
(2)洗涤。
(3)冲刷；冲荡。
(4)吮吸，饮。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shù］
["Guangyun" Su Zuoqie, go to wait, and give birth. ]
["Guangyun" cut, go to you, and give birth. ]
Also known as "wash 1". "Cough 3" was passed falsely.
(1) Wash the oral cavity with water.
(2) Washing.
(3) Scouring; flushing.
(4) Sucking and drinking.
